name: Arena of Death
description:
Arena of Death is a little arenashooter with 3 different arenas, 8 playable characters and tons of monsters.

Can you survive all 100 waves?

Game made by Raphael Schaaf, with an awesome chiptune soundtrack by James Primate.

Have Fun :D

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move (2x to dash)

J: Jump

K: Hit

L: Shoot
